org.apache.hadoop.hbase.quotas

Class NoOpRegionSizeStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.quotas.NoOpRegionSizeStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<Map.Entry<RegionInfo,RegionSize>>, HeapSize, RegionSizeStore

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public final class NoOpRegionSizeStore
extends Object
implements RegionSizeStore
    A RegionSizeStore implementation that stores nothing.
